title: Propidium Iodide Staining of Cells for FACS Analysis
procedures: Trypsinize and harvest cells, fix cells into 0.5 ml 70% EtOH (pre-cooled to -20 °C overnight).   Store fixed cells on ice at least 1 h and for up to several days.   Spin down cells for 2 min at 4,000 rpm.   Resuspend cell pellet in 0.5 ml PBS containing 0.25% Triton X-100 and incubate on ice for 15 min.   Spin down the cells for 2 min at 4,000 rpm.   Discard supernatant and resuspend cell pellet in 0.5 ml PBS containing 10 μg/ml RNase A and 20 μg/ml PI stock solution, transfer to FACS tubes and incubate at room temperature (RT) in the dark for 30 min.   Ready for FACS.
